title: requirment1
description: Web Store shall operate with the following internet browsers: Microsoft Internet Explorer version 6 and 7, Netscape Communicator Version 4 and 5.

title: requirment2
description: Web Store shall operate on an Intel based system with Slackware Linux 2.6 and Apache Web Server. The operating system is designed by the Yoggie Corporation. Although maintenance documentation will be supplied and the operating system will be tested, the developers of this Web Store are not responsible for the functionality of the operating system.

title: requirment3
description: The system shall use SQL based database to store inventory information.

title: requirment4
description: USB interface and divers are provided by Yoggie Corporation.

title: requirment5
description: Must use a SQL based database. SQL standard is the most widely used database format. Restricting to SQL allows easy of use and compatibility for Web Store.

title: requirment6
description: Compatibility is only tested and verified for Microsoft Internet Explorer version 6 and 7, Netscape Communicator Version 4 and 5. Other versions may not be 100% compatible. Also other browsers such as Mozilla or Firefox may not be 100% compatible.

title: requirment7
description: Shall install online help for users via the web interface

title: requirment8
description: Shall deliver Operations and Maintenance manual, Users Guide book, and Installation Instructions for the Administrator.

title: requirment9
description: Assume the delivery of development, test and evaluate samples of the USB system from Yoggie.

title: requirment10
description: Assume Yoggie will freeze the baseline of the USB system after delivery.

title: requirment11
description: Upon the USB being plugged in the system shall be able to be deployed and operational in less than 1 minute.

title: requirment12
description: The system shall be able to handle 1000 customers logged in concurrently at the same time.

title: requirment13
description: The system shall be able to retrieve 200 products per second.

title: requirment14
description: The system shall be able to add product to shopping cart in less than 2ms.

title: requirment15
description: The system shall be able to search for a specified product in less than 1 second.

title: requirment16
description: The system shall be able to email customer and vendor in less than 1 second.

title: requirment17
description: The system shall be able to validate credit card in less than 2 seconds.

title: requirment18
description: The system shall be able to acquire shipping charges in less than 2 seconds.

title: requirment19
description: The system shall be able to restore 1000 records per second.

title: requirment20
description: The system will do periodic backups through a live internet connection.

title: requirment21
description: The system shall validate credit cards against fraud.

title: requirment22
description: The system shall encrypt all sensitive information via https.

title: requirment23
description: The system shall encrypt all customer data in database.

title: requirment24
description: The system shall auto detect IP DOS attacks and block IP automatically.

title: requirment25
description: The system shall detect consecutive failed login attempts.

title: requirment26
description: The system shall be protected by open source firewall called Firestarter. http://www.fs-security.com/

title: requirment27
description: The system shall have an availability of 99.99%.

title: requirment28
description: The system shall perform searches via Dijkstra's shortest path algorithm.

title: requirment29
description:
For returning customers, the system shall validate 'existing' credit card in system
                                after each log in.

title: requirment30
description: The system shall automatically compress image files that are too large in size.

title: requirment31
description: The system will employ on demand asynchronous loading for faster execution of pages.

title: requirment32
description: The system shall validate email address existence.

title: requirment33
description: The system shall be easy to use

title: requirment34
description: The system shall be easy to learn

title: requirment35
description: The system shall utilize help bubbles to assist managers, customers, and administrators

title: requirment36
description: The system shall employ easy to locate buttons

title: requirment37
description: The system shall prompt customer with friend easy to read error messages.

title: requirment38
description: The system shall utilize consistent symbols and colors for clear notifications.

title: requirment39
description: The system shall utilize interchangeable plugins.

title: requirment40
description: The system shall be easily updatable for fixes and patches.

title: requirment41
description: The system shall create logs of all changes, updates, or fixes that are done to the site.

title: requirment42
description: The system shall be easy to upgrade.

title: requirment43
description: The system shall be extremely portable via the usb drive.

title: requirment44
description: The system shall be easy to migrate or backed up via another usb drive.

title: requirment45
description: The system should be able to run under debug mode.

title: requirment46
description: The system should be able to run test credit card transactions.

title: requirment47
description: The system should be able to run test shipping orders.

title: requirment48
description: The system should be able to create test environment of weborder system.

title: requirment49
description: The system hardware shall be fixed and patched via an internet connection.

title: requirment50
description:
Yoggie shall coordinate on future enhancement and features with our
            organization.

title: requirment51
description:
The system shall adhere to the following hardware requirements:
        
4GB Flash ram chip
128MB SDRAM
Intel XScale PXA270 520-MHz chipset
OS: Apache web server
Database: MySQL
